resources.string: Welcome to our app! Here\'s a quick how-to guide so you know your way around.

"Browse" - see categories of drinks and browse drink recipes. 
"Quiz me!" - test yourself on your knowledge! 
"My recipes" - see your favourite drinks and add your own recipes! Note that recipes you add will only be visible to you. 
"Watch" - watch and learn from some helpful Youtube videos!

Click on \"My Recipes\" in the bottom navigation bar. Click on the + button. Make sure your recipe has a unique name! \nAt the moment you can only add drink images from URL but we are working on being able to upload your own pictures. You can use imgur.com to store images online.
Go to the detailed view of the drink and click on the heart in the top right corner. If it\'s already red, you\'ve already favourited the drink!
